mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OHLCV (isin, s_date, open, high, low, close, volume, amount, updown) VALUES (#{isin}, TO_DATE(#{s_date}, 'YYYYMMDD'),, #{open}, #{high}, #{low}, #{close}, #{volume}, #{amount}, #{updown})
mapper.select: select * from ohlcv where isin = #{isin} and s_date = #{date}

SELECT s.isin, s.name FROM stock s JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ohlcv WHERE S_DATE = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN') = 'SAT' THEN TRUNC(SYSDATE + 3 / 8) - CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') <= '16:00:00' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN') = 'SUN' THEN TRUNC(SYSDATE + 3 / 8) - CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') <= '16:00:00' THEN 3 ELSE 2 END ELSE TRUNC(SYSDATE + 3 / 8) - CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') <= '16:00:00' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ORDER BY UPDOWN DESC ) o ON s.isin = o.isin WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
